title: Maritime Launch Services breaks ground on Canada’s first orbital launch site
summary: Maritime Launch Services (MLS) in Canada has received approval to begin construction of Spaceport Nova Scotia within the framework of an Environmental Assessment approved in 2019.

title: HawkEye 360 plans new funding round as it positions to go public
summary: HawkEye 360 is looking at a new round of funding, and possibly going public in a couple of years, CEO John Serafini said Sept. 8.

title: NASA to Host National Space Council Meeting at Johnson Space Center
summary: NASA to Host National Space Council Meeting at Johnson Space Center

title: SpaceX to launch five spare Iridium satellites
summary: Iridium will launch five of its remaining six ground spare satellites on a Falcon 9 rideshare mission in 2023, the company announced Sept. 8.

title: Rocket Report: SLS launch targeted for late September, unique view of Falcon 9
summary: "I cannot see a rebuild of the cooperation we had in the past."
